content: “Anti-Hyperlipidemic Activity of Polyphenol-Rich Extract of Cochlospermum Planchonii Roots in Triton X-100 Induced Rats”. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences 9, no. 1 (August 31, 2020). Accessed December 30, 2025. https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/258.
